member.name: T:DuetAPIClient.BaseCommandConnection
member.summary: Base connection class for sending commands to the control server

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.BaseCommandConnection.#ctor(DuetAPI.Connection.ConnectionMode)
member.summary: Protected constructor for derived modes that can issue regular commands

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.BaseCommandConnection.AddHttpEndpoint(DuetAPI.Machine.HttpEndpointType,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Add a new third-party HTTP endpoint in the format /machine/{ns}/{path}
member.returns: Wrapper around the UNIX socket for accepting HTTP endpoint requests
member.exception: UNIX socket could not be opened

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.BaseCommandConnection.AddUserSession(DuetAPI.Machine.AccessLevel,DuetAPI.Machine.SessionType,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Add a new user session
member.param: Origin of the user session (e.g. IP address)
Origin of the user session (e.g. WebSocket port). Defaults to the current PID

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.BaseCommandConnection.Flush(DuetAPI.CodeChannel,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Wait for all pending codes of the given channel to finish
member.returns: True if all pending codes could be flushed

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.BaseCommandConnection.GetFileInfo(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Parse a G-code file and returns file information about it

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.BaseCommandConnection.GetMachineModel(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieve the full object model of the machine. In subscription mode this is the first command that has to be called once a connection has been established

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.BaseCommandConnection.GetSerializedMachineModel(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Optimized method to directly query the machine model UTF-8 JSON

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.BaseCommandConnection.LockMachineModel(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Lock the machine model for read/write access. It is MANDATORY to call when write access has finished

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.BaseCommandConnection.PerformCode(DuetAPI.Commands.Code,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Execute an arbitrary pre-parsed code
member.exception: Code or operation has been cancelled
member.remarks: Cancelling the read operation does not cancel the code execution

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.BaseCommandConnection.PerformSimpleCode(System.String,DuetAPI.CodeChannel,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Execute an arbitrary G/M/T-code in text form and return the result as a string
member.param: Optional destination channel of this code
member.returns: Result of the given code converted to a string
member.exception: Code or operation has been cancelled
member.remarks: Cancelling the read operation does not cancel the code execution

member.summary: Remove an existing HTTP endpoint
member.param: Type of the endpoint to remove
Namespace of the endpoint to remove
member.returns: True if the endpoint could be removed

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.BaseCommandConnection.RemoveUserSession(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Remove an existing user session
member.returns: True if the session could be removed

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.BaseCommandConnection.ResolvePath(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Resolve a RepRapFirmware-style file path to a real file path

member.summary: Set a given property to a certain value. Make sure to lock the object model before calling this
member.returns: True if the property could be updated

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.BaseCommandConnection.SyncMachineModel(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Wait for the full machine model to be updated from RepRapFirmware

member.summary: Unlock the machine model again

member.summary: Optimized method to query the machine model UTF-8 JSON in any mode. May be used to get machine model patches as well.

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.SubscribeConnection.GetMachineModelPatch(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Receive a (partial) machine model update. If the subscription mode is set to , new update patches of the object model need to be applied manually. This method is intended to receive such fragments.
